Vehement:



He looked at the blast and was struck, his armor sizzling, falling back a few 
feet.  He ran a scan on his armor, and it was still pretty much intact.  
Vehement sighed, not wanting to deal with all these insignificant fools, 
firing down a single optic blast at Tavatron, continuing on course.
